amendatorysection.para: The Legislature declares that the policy of the State of Nebraska is that there shall be a coordinated effort to (1) establish community correctional programs across the state in order to divert adult felony offenders from the prison system and (2) provide necessary supervision and services to adult felony offenders with the goal of reducing the probability of criminal behavior while maintaining public safety. To further such policy, the Community Corrections Council is created. For administrative support and budgetary purposes only, the council shall be within the Nebraska Commission on Law Enforcement and Criminal Justice.
